U1.name: LP87524
U1.notes: PMIC loss estimate from typical load/efficiency; replace with calculated loss if rail currents available.

U19.name: TPS2115A
U19.notes: Quiescent current from INx; operating current not extracted from text.

U2.name: radar SoC
U2.notes: Power computed from max current table; represents worst-case upper bound.

notes: Computed power uses datasheet currents where provided; missing values yield nulls.
